New Records: Netherlands won by 13 runs, guaranteeing them a top-four finish in the group and an automatic spot in the next T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Roelof van der Merwe's incredible catch to dismiss David Miller, turning the game around for Netherlands
Stephan Myburgh's big-hitting up front, scoring 37 runs
Tom Cooper's aggressive batting, scoring 35 runs
Brandon Glover's impact with the ball, taking 3 wickets, including Rilee Rossouw and David Miller
Fred Klaassen's accurate bowling, taking 2 wickets and restricting South Africa's powerplay
Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands' win would guarantee them a top-four finish in the group and an automatic spot in the next T20 World Cup
South Africa needed to win to stay in contention for a semi-final spot
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's shock defeat ends their World Cup campaign
Netherlands celebrate a historic win and a significant moment in their cricket history
The win has implications for the semi-final spots, with India qualifying and the Bangladesh vs Pakistan match becoming a knockout
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a turning point in the tournament, with the Netherlands' win guaranteeing India a spot in the semi-finals
The win has significant implications for the next T20 World Cup, with the Netherlands securing an automatic spot
